name: VindiTek
tagline: Dedicated Development Team that delivers RESULT
description:
We have started only 4 years ago and already have a number of achievements to be proud of:
1.We’ve managed to take part in developing products with Vodafone and Huawei
2. Our team has created the solution that is currently used by Real Madrid School
3. 96 % of our clients come back to us with new projects or references.
 
We practice creative approach throughout development and always make sure to hire engineers with at least proven Middle-level working experience and advanced English. Our team key benefit is “product set of mind” attitude. So our clients are confident that we are able to take care of the whole product development cycle starting from the ideation phase and up to the post-release QA.
Great ideas are worth to be embodied in the best on-line and mobile apps that we can create step by step and lead your business to success. Boost now and rise big with us!
